queries.description: Containers should not run with allowPrivilegeEscalation in order to prevent them from gaining more privileges than their parent process

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{release-name-vault-operator}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{vault-operator}}.securityContext.allowPrivilegeEscalation should be set and should be set to false
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{release-name-vault-operator}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{vault-operator}}.securityContext.allowPrivilegeEscalation is undefined

queries.description: Roles and ClusterRoles with wildcard RBAC permissions provide excessive rights to the Kubernetes API and should be avoided. The principle of least privilege recommends to specify only the set of needed objects and actions

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{release-name-vault-operator}}.rules[0].resources should list the minimal set of needed objects or actions
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{release-name-vault-operator}}.rules[0].resources uses wildcards to specify objects or actions

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{release-name-vault-operator}}.rules[1].verbs should list the minimal set of needed objects or actions
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{release-name-vault-operator}}.rules[1].verbs uses wildcards to specify objects or actions

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{release-name-vault-operator}}.rules[3].verbs should list the minimal set of needed objects or actions
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{release-name-vault-operator}}.rules[3].verbs uses wildcards to specify objects or actions

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{release-name-vault-operator}}.rules[0].verbs should list the minimal set of needed objects or actions
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{release-name-vault-operator}}.rules[0].verbs uses wildcards to specify objects or actions

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{release-name-vault-operator}}.rules[2].verbs should list the minimal set of needed objects or actions
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{release-name-vault-operator}}.rules[2].verbs uses wildcards to specify objects or actions

queries.description: Containers should only run as non-root user. This limits the exploitability of security misconfigurations and restricts an attacker's possibilities in case of compromise

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{release-name-vault-operator}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{vault-operator}}.securityContext.runAsUser is higher than 0 and/or 'runAsNonRoot' is true
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{release-name-vault-operator}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{vault-operator}}.securityContext.runAsUser is 0 and 'runAsNonRoot' is false

queries.description: Check if containers are running with low UID, which might cause conflicts with the host's user table.

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{release-name-vault-operator}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{vault-operator}}.securityContext.runAsUser should be defined
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{release-name-vault-operator}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{vault-operator}}.securityContext.runAsUser is undefined

queries.description: Containers should drop 'ALL' or at least 'NET_RAW' capabilities

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{release-name-vault-operator}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{vault-operator}}.securityContext.capabilities.drop should be defined
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{release-name-vault-operator}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{vault-operator}}.securityContext.capabilities.drop is undefined

queries.description: The permission to create pods in a cluster should be restricted because it allows privilege escalation.

files.expected_value: metadata.name=release-name-vault-operator.rules.verbs should not contain a wildcard value when metadata.name=release-name-vault-operator.rules.resources contains the value 'pods'
files.actual_value: metadata.name=release-name-vault-operator.rules.verbs contains a wildcard value and metadata.name=release-name-vault-operator.rules.resources contains the value 'pods'

queries.description: Containers should be configured with a secure Seccomp profile to restrict potentially dangerous syscalls

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{release-name-vault-operator}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{vault-operator}}.securityContext.seccompProfile.type should be defined
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{release-name-vault-operator}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{vault-operator}}.securityContext.seccompProfile.type is undefined

queries.query_name: Service Account Token Automount Not Disabled
queries.description: Service Account Tokens are automatically mounted even if not necessary

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{release-name-vault-operator}}.spec.template.spec.automountServiceAccountToken should be defined and set to false
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{release-name-vault-operator}}.spec.template.spec.automountServiceAccountToken is undefined

queries.description: Roles and ClusterRoles when binded, should not use get, list or watch as verbs

files.expected_value: The metadata.name={{release-name-vault-operator}}.rules.verbs should not contain the following verbs: [["*"]]
files.actual_value: The metadata.name={{release-name-vault-operator}}.rules.verbs contain the following verbs: [["*"]]

queries.description: Namespaces like 'default', 'kube-system' or 'kube-public' should not be used

files.expected_value: metadata.namespace should be defined and not null
files.actual_value: metadata.namespace is undefined or null

files.expected_value: metadata.namespace should be defined and not null
files.actual_value: metadata.namespace is undefined or null

files.expected_value: metadata.namespace should be defined and not null
files.actual_value: metadata.namespace is undefined or null

queries.query_name: Image Pull Policy Of The Container Is Not Set To Always
queries.description: Image Pull Policy of the container must be defined and set to Always

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{release-name-vault-operator}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{vault-operator}}.imagePullPolicy should be set to 'Always'
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{release-name-vault-operator}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{vault-operator}}.imagePullPolicy relies on mutable images in cache

queries.description: Containers should be configured with an AppArmor profile to enforce fine-grained access control over low-level system resources

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{release-name-vault-operator}}.spec.template.metadata.annotations should specify an AppArmor profile for container {{vault-operator}}
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{release-name-vault-operator}}.spec.template.metadata.annotations does not specify an AppArmor profile for container {{vault-operator}}

queries.description: Sees if Kubernetes Drop Capabilities exists to ensure containers security context

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{release-name-vault-operator}}.spec.containers.name=vault-operator.securityContext should be set
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{release-name-vault-operator}}.spec.containers.name=vault-operator.securityContext is undefined

queries.query_name: Object Is Using A Deprecated API Version
queries.description: Kubernetes APIs evolve over time and are sometimes removed with newer releases. To prevent incompatibilities when upgrading Kubernetes, deprecated APIs should be replaced with newer and more stable API versions.

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{release-name-vault-operator}}.apiVersion of ClusterRole should be {{rbac.authorization.k8s.io/v1}}
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{release-name-vault-operator}}.apiVersion of ClusterRole  is deprecated and is {{rbac.authorization.k8s.io/v1beta1}}

queries.description: Each namespace should have a LimitRange policy associated to ensure that resource allocations of Pods, Containers and PersistentVolumeClaims do not exceed the defined boundaries

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{release-name-vault-operator}} has a 'LimitRange' policy associated
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{release-name-vault-operator}} does not have a 'LimitRange' policy associated

queries.description: Each namespace should have a ResourceQuota policy associated to limit the total amount of resources Pods, Containers and PersistentVolumeClaims can consume

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{release-name-vault-operator}} has a 'ResourceQuota' policy associated
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{release-name-vault-operator}} does not have a 'ResourceQuota' policy associated

queries.query_name: Pod or Container Without Security Context
queries.description: A security context defines privilege and access control settings for a Pod or Container

files.expected_value: spec.template.spec.containers.name=vault-operator has a security context
files.actual_value: spec.template.spec.containers.name=vault-operator does not have a security context

queries.description: Check if the root container filesystem is not being mounted read-only.

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{release-name-vault-operator}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{vault-operator}}.securityContext.readOnlyRootFilesystem should be set to true
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{release-name-vault-operator}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{vault-operator}}.securityContext.readOnlyRootFilesystem is undefined
